var link="http://localhost:8000/api";export default{link:link,login:link+"/login",register:link+"/register",forgot:link+"/forgot",logout:link+"/logout",secret:link+"/secret",reset:function reset(data){return link+"/reset/"+data.ident+"/"+data.today+"-"+data.hash;},verify:function verify(data){return link+"/verify/"+data.ident+"/"+data.today+"-"+data.hash;},resetVerify:function resetVerify(data){return link+"/reset/verify/"+data.ident+"/"+data.today+"-"+data.hash;}};
